APPLICATION_CONFIGURATION.EXPORT_COMMENT: 1.) Updated Custom field, Time Executed, to "Updateable" 2.) Custom Event: Changed the code, so that there is no direct table Insert or Update 3.) Created DB package to accomodate the creation of a DB Job

ITEMS_ROW.NAME: AMR_TRANSPORT_LINES
ITEMS_ROW.DESCRIPTION: Generate a Timestamp for: Line Creation and Line Execution.

ITEMS_ROW.DESCRIPTION: Create a timestamp for either a record created or executed.
